# pyblack

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Style Python code blocks with [black](https://github.com/psf/black) in RStudio.

## Installation

```r
devtools::install_github("erictleung/pyblack")
```

You must have black installed and accessible in your path for this addin to
work.

```bash
pip install black
```

## Usage

In your text editor, highlight the relevant Python code you wish to format.

Then navigate in RStudio to Addins > PYBLACK > Style selection with black.
